Player History
Won World Series with San Francisco in 2001...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 3/1/2002 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 5th round, 138th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2006...
Released by Baltimore on 3/2/2006...
Drafted in 3rd round, 69th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2011...
Traded from Los Angeles to Florida on 5/25/2011 (Going to LA: CF J. Pierre. Going to FLA: P K. Crick)...
Traded from Florida to Detroit on 3/1/2012 (Going to FLA: LF I. Suzuki. Going to DET: P K. Crick)...
Traded from Detroit to Florida on 3/1/2012 (Going to FLA: P K. Crick. Going to DET: LF I. Suzuki)...
Injured on 5/1/2012 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 6/2/2012 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/12/2015 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Released by Florida on 10/23/2016...

Injured on 9/5/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
